unallowed: Hey ! you're not allowed to use this command!

reverse.noMessage: {{emojis.no}} | Please specify a message to reverse!

global.Title: **Help - YouTube Bot**
global.Desc: You can find **{{cmdslength}}** commands in **{{categorieslength}}** categories

help.failedSendEmbed: {{emojis.no}} | Oops an error occurred while i tried to send the help embed: {{err}}

play.description: Play a music, playlist from YouTube.
play.novc: {{emojis.no}} | You must join a voice channel to use this command!
play.error: {{emojis.no}} | Oops an error occurred while i tried to search: {{err}}

Music.importing_playlist: {{emojis.loading}} | Playlist detected! Importing **{{songs}}** tracks, please wait...
Music.no_audio_nodes_online: {{emojis.no}} | Oops there isn't any audio node available ! please try again later.
Music.cannot_join_vc: {{emojis.no}} | Oops i couldn't join your voice channel: {{err}}
Music.reach_queue_limit: {{emojis.no}} | Oh no ! you reached queue's limit of **{{limit}}** tracks, consider subscribing to youtube bot premium if isn't already done to be able to add more songs.
Music.empty_queue: {{emojis.no}} | Queue is empty ! Leaving voice channel...
Music.added_queue: {{emojis.plus}} | Added **{{length}}** tracks from a playlist to the queue
Music.Title: {{emojis.disk}} **❱** {{title}} {{attributes}}
Music.Author: {{emojis.upload}} **❱** {{author}} {{attributes}}
